channel.title: Can I flip this?
channel.description:
So I just added this notification, but I'm not sure why its going vertical and not horizontal :| [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/70kryx.png[/img]
I did the unnamed version since this is DELTA [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/299509-ref-my-new-alert-system-ref-5.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/299509-ref-my-new-alert-system-ref-5.html[/url]
